item.title: Glossary Of Terms

item.description: Term Type Brief Description AccountingContext Context – undefined – ActivateMember Command Update state of member to Active ActivateProduct Command – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active Enumerator – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active Enumerator Tenant is active and suitable for use Active Enumerator – undefined – Active State – undefined –
